TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationUserCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationUserCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用以程式設計方式存取和修改`users`項目`credentials`一節中`forms`一節`authorization`組態區段。The uses the to programmatically access and modify the `users` element of the `credentials` section in the `forms` section of the `authorization` configuration section. 此類型是包含群組的一部分，則，和型別。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用`credentials`項目一定要遵照所說明的指導方針[ASP.NET 驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100))。If you use the `credentials` element be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100)). 如需延展性和更佳的安全性，建議您使用外部資料庫來儲存使用者的認證。For scalability and better security, it is recommended you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 如需有關如何建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式的詳細資訊，請搜尋 Microsoft MSDN 網站 (msdn.microsoft.com)"保護 ASP.NET 應用程式 」 和 「 建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式： 驗證、 授權和安全通訊。 」For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會插入`remove`插入適當的區段中的任何項目較高層級的組態檔中定義的組態檔的項目。This method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file for any element defined in a higher-level configuration file. 如果目前的組態檔的適當區段中定義的項目，其項目是從組態檔移除。If the element is defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file. 要移除的物件必須存在於集合中。The object to remove must exist in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/CS/formsauthenticationcredentials.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/VB/formsauthenticationcredentials.vb#9)]
